post.body: what do we like? I'd say variety of subjects & humour - makes a good Twitterer in my book. Just need to do that myself now! lol
at least you get to fix interesting stuff like iTunes - wait till they get Virus's & Spyware ;0)
Will do Don, mind you, the way it's going it'll be Next flippin Christmas! lol
That's such a good Switching bundle, I'll have to write a Blog post on it... Curse you Mr McAllister - more work for me! lol
Sorry... Don who? hehe ;0)
how do you get Pikachu onto a Bus? ....... Poke him on ! ( see what I did there...) LOL
Evernote lives on the 2nd screen of my iPhone - might make the first, depends on what's in the next update. ;0)
how did you make up the 3 gig in the mini? ie - what ram modules? Ta!
Finally! LOL - bet you've been fed up waiting for the One Show to get their act together?
ooh, which supermarket did you spot the RD DVDs at then Bob?
never used Vista Peter? Just disable about half the features if OS X and pull the power plug at random intervals - bout the same :0)
Haha! That'll teach him :0D bet Laura is pleased!
can we be nosey & ask what the case is Peter? (will quite understand if private :0)
at least you got the letter! LOL swear our posties chuck some of ours away... :0(
nice site Anna, like the clean & simple lines - is the background just an image?
see what you mean David, I'm not that religious in the 'go to church' way, but used to send Diwali cards to Asian friends...
You could always send him a Chanukah card David? (aka Hanukkah) - Jewish festival of light, celebrated late December
Did you get that client money you were waiting for Lewis?
ahh, read more of your tweets - maybe the RAF not the RAC ! lol
Does Tweetie have a '1 screen per tweet' mode like Twitteriffic Don?
Only if you havent left it for ages to refresh! Otherwise it only goes back to about 6 hours ago - would be handy though
nice macro shots Victor! Used to take those kind of pics with old 35mm film camera years ago - must try with my D40X now!
Exactly Elaine - says she with a Red Background & Christmas Star....
"Only for the Festive Season though my dear, only for the Festive Season..." couldn't resist a bit of Humbug-ery :0)
Adobe are getting rid of about 600 people due to 'lower than expected demand for CS4' at over Â£1k? Duh Adobe!
Payl, do you have a Griffin Clarify case for your iPhone? Wanted to ask you about the finish of it...
Hmm, cool designer stuff ... an Anglepoise Lamp - an original mind, not a modern one ;0)
it's the indignity of slipping that hurts more than the fall IMHO ;0) & do let us know what you think of the new display
... And the fee probably pays for the CEO to have a Macbook Air ;0)
Thanks for the tip ! Off to track one down now :0D
Cheers Paul! Look forward to hearing you keeping the side up when it hits the feeds ;0)
glad you had a good one Stu - only sorry I couldn't make it again, working towards a clear Friday night next week ;0)
Thanks for the pointer griffintech - the Clarifi looks like the case for me !
thanks for the reccomendation - I wanted to try Snapper, but wouldn't work with std lens :0)
np Lewis :0)
You might want to take some ID with you if you go to a Branch Lewis, birth certificate maybe? & any letters they've sent you.
Thanks for the info on Tweetie Don, sounds like a nice app, might have to give it a try, if Santa brings an iTunes gift card!
Reggie - probably keep saying 'hippopotamus' & open a chain of shops selling junk :0)
it's the 'upgrade degradation subroutine' - slowly cripples your App until you are forced to upgrade - me? I switched to Coda
that last Bus reference Tweet was meant to be pointed at you ! LOL
was going to try the cards this year, but money wouldn't allow, maybe next year.
looking nice Wayne - and the book looks great too!
knowing my luck, if I tried that it would turn into the 2CV on YouTube - LOL
The Nat West have been the best Business Bank I've had so far - if that's any help? :0)
Many Happy Returns Gazmaz :0)
nice pics Paul & a nice place to live too by the look of it!
ahh right, I see. Well, I'd say it would have to be an O2 data stick, or it may not recognise it?
take it yours doesn't then? :0s
obviously the same one who decided Geraldine McQueen ;0)
At Dentist for checkup - everything crossed! :0s
I've been threatening to make one of these for years - B & Q beat me to it! - http://twitpic.com/r96g
Might be time to call the AA or RAC then Bob :0s
Night All - catch you in the Morning.
BAH HUMBUG ! - well someone had to try and offset this mood of joviality that's pervading Twitter! ;0)
Agrees with everyone on the Adobe fisaco - they got too greedy & now it's bitten them on the arse - swapped to Coda & PSE 6 - saved a bundle
I *was* a PC ... but I had the Op, and now I'm happy as a Mac :0D
Dentist update from yesterday - no unexpected work needs doing! Have a Crown scheduled for early next year - post for it is carbon fibre!
Thanks to Typicalmacuser (Victor Cajiao) for the follow! - had my DSLR for a while & still a 'Noob' ;0)
Does anyone have a Griffin Clarifi Case for their iPhone 3G? wanted some feedback from a user rather than reviews... T.I.A.
Morning all, MBP updated fine using 'Software Update' file (190mb) still using iMac to heavily to risk updating just yet!
They ARE like Buses - nowt for months then 2 come along at once ! :0) hehe
Any updated to 10.5.6 from Software Update recently? Have Apple fixed the file problem they had there? Ta!
Helped a client out after their hosting keeled over - was nice to get their thanks & feel appreciated! Hasn't happened much lately :0(
IT Crowd does it again - each ep. gets better! :0D
DS Lite now sold - thanks for the interest folks :0D
Re: DSLite Â£90 Inc Special Del (UK) with Brain training & another game & leathery case - box too. Was an unwanted gift, good as new. Ta!
Anyone interested in a Nintendo DS Lite (black) before I put it on eBay? Cheers !
